SPECUMANIA SURF THE BUBBLE

SPECUMANIA

We issue this token just to be part of the current ICO bubble. It's not just surfing the hype - it's also research. We are up to write a paper on "The Alt Token Bubble". Seriously.

Read the whitepaper

Value

This token hast absolute no value. Exchanging anything valueable for this token does not make any common sense.

But what is common sense? People earning millions by trading altcoins. You never know if a coin will skyrocket or fail. If you are one of the gold diggers out there: Invest in value!

The bubble burst. Someday.

Looks great

Everything looks so great. We set up a fancy website and used the cool polygon/particle theme like all the others.

We hosted the page on github.io to be as cool as all pros out there. Look at all these fancy logos. We used sass, gulp, node.js, git, github and way more to set up this awesome non valuable coin.

We just fucked up the logo with gimp. Sorry for that.

The ICO

We maybe make a presale. If not we don't. Depends on how we deep we can digg into the ether smart contract shit.

It's fun but timeconsuming. We are a big team. At least enough to say we instead of I. Sounds way more eleborated. Like a big company. If we hit our goals we will list the coin on exchanges.
